name: weblate
tagline: A continuous localization and translation platform
description: Weblate is a self-hosted continuous localization platform for translating software and websites. It integrates with Git, offers translation editors, and can also be used as a hosted service.

features.title: Translation Management
features.description: Coordinate software and website translations across multiple languages in one platform

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Sync directly with Git repositories to keep translations in version control alongside code

features.title: Translation Memory
features.description: Reuse previous translations automatically to maintain consistency and speed up work

features.title: Machine Translation
features.description: Leverage services like Google Translate, DeepL, or Microsoft Translator for initial drafts

features.title: Quality Checks
features.description: Automatically detect translation issues like missing placeholders, formatting errors, or inconsistencies

features.title: Glossary Support
features.description: Maintain terminology glossaries to ensure consistent translation of technical terms

features.title: Collaborative Workflow
features.description: Enable multiple translators to work simultaneously with conflict resolution and review processes

features.title: Context Information
features.description: Provide translators with screenshots, source code context, and comments for accurate translations
